transformed.qual: owner_id = (SELECT auth.uid()) OR shared_with @> ARRAY[(SELECT auth.uid())]

qual.transformed: owner_id = (SELECT auth.uid()) OR shared_with @> ARRAY[(SELECT auth.uid())]

individual.create_sql: CREATE POLICY "documents_select_policy" ON "documents" AS PERMISSIVE FOR SELECT TO "authenticated" USING (owner_id = (SELECT auth.uid()) OR shared_with @> ARRAY[(SELECT auth.uid())]);
CREATE POLICY "documents_update_policy" ON "documents" AS PERMISSIVE FOR UPDATE TO "authenticated" USING (owner_id = (SELECT auth.uid())) WITH CHECK (owner_id = (SELECT auth.uid()));
